Alternate Title: We'll get them! The 2nd National Defense Loan. Subscribe.
Creator: Faivre, Abel, 1867-1945, artist
Description: Poster showing  a French soldier with gun in one hand, and the other raised. According to the Library of Congress, this was the most remembered French poster produced during the war.
Physical Collection: Texas War Records War Poster collection
